titles.title: Jesus, Keep Me Near the Cross

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, keep me near the cross, There a precious fountain— Free to all, a healing stream— Flows from Calv’ry’s mountain.{/lang-eng}

verse.lines: {lang-eng}Near the cross I’ll watch and wait Hoping, trusting ever, Till I reach the golden strand, Just beyond the river.{/lang-eng}
